title: viddaik-adhipatiyE
sahitya:
viddaik-adhipatiyE vANi vINApANi malar vENi kalli rANI


caraNam 1    veN paTTuDittiyE veNpani mAlai pUNDu veN tAmarai tanil 
vITriyirukkum tAyE kaN pArtt-engaLukku kalvi aruLvAyE 
kamala malar pAdam paNindOm karkkat-tuNindOmUkkam 
munaindOm urakkam munindOm
    caraNam 2    tanja enraDaindOrat-tarkAttu rakSikka anjEl anrEgi
vandumE tAn aruLum cancalam tIrttiDum sarasvati tAyE
santatam engaLaikkAru gati vEru edu pAru karuNai kUru
    caraNam 3    azhiyAp-pugazh peTra arum pulavOrellAm vazhiyAi 
nin perumai vaLarttanar nALum anrO avvazhi engaTku
aruL tara vENDum anrO aDaikkalam AnOm un 
pAdam adE pOdum aruLvAi bOdham aruT-prasAdam
